description: Washington, D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) on Monday afternoon is scheduled to discuss President Trump's takeover of the district's police force and activation of the National Guard in an effort to reduce crime in the nation's capital. “Our capital city has been overtaken by violent gangs and bloodthirsty criminals, roving mobs of wild youth, drugged-out maniacs and...

description: The D.C. City Council condemned President Trump’s federalization of the city’s police force and plans to deploy the National Guard to fight crime in the city. “This is a manufactured intrusion on local authority. Violent crime in the District is at the lowest rates we’ve seen in 30 years. Federalizing the Metropolitan Police Department is...

description: The Farmers' Almanac hasn't always been the most accurate source for upcoming weather events, according to researchers.
title: Farmers' Almanac predicts 'wild weather' in winter outlook. Is it accurate, though?

description: Del. Eleanor Holmes Norton (D-D.C.) criticized President Trump's plan to federalize the Metropolitan Police Department and deploy National Guard troops to combat crime, calling it an "historic assault" on D.C.'s autonomy and a justification for her push for statehood.

description: An explosion at a U.S. Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh on Monday left people trapped under the rubble, officials say.

author: Sharon Udasin
description: Relying on dollar stores for the bulk of grocery purchases might not be harming American diets, despite the comparative lack of healthy products, a new study has found. As families look to free up funds on costly shopping lists, they are increasingly turning to their locals dollar stores to buy staple food items, according to...

This is a war that should have never happened,” Trump told reporters at...

description: AI is slowly but surely replacing skilled tradesmen, making the blue-collar bloodbath inevitable, and the hands-on craft, intuition, and mentorship of the trades may not survive the transition.

description: A federal appeals court on Saturday ordered the Trump administration to restore a public database showing how federal funding is apportioned.  The administration disabled the database in March as it stared down several lawsuits challenging funding freezes, claiming Congress’ mandate to make the data public infringed on President Trump’s core executive authority.   “To hear the Government...

description: The union representing CDC employees is urging the Trump administration to condemn the spread of false information about vaccines and protect employees from future violent threats after a gunman targeted the agency's Atlanta headquarters on Friday.

description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) said Sunday that he would be willing to call indefinite special sessions of the state’s legislature to force through a new congressional map, attempting to escalate pressure on Texas Democrats who have stonewalled votes by fleeing the state. “This could literally last years,” Abbott said on Fox News. “As soon...

description: By prioritizing this fight, voters are still not hearing a middle of the road message from the Democratic Party that offers an alternative to President Trump and the Republican Party.

description: Babies born during the height of the COVID-19 pandemic are heading to preschool and kindergarten, and experts are waiting anxiously to see its impact on the young learners. description: A three-day bench trial will begin Monday over whether President Trump’s National Guard deployment to Los Angeles violated a general prohibition on using federal troops as civilian law enforcement. The Washington Post has reported that close to 120 FBI agents are beginning to be deployed for nightlong shifts to assist D.C. law enforcement...

title: Former Surgeon General on HHS cancelling vaccine research: 'Over 2 million lives have been saved because of mRNA technology'

description: Rep. One of ICE's only family detention facilities is in your district in...
